00022 /**
00023  * @file   SummaryStats.cpp
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  *
00026  * @brief  Utility class for keeping track of summary statistics.
00027  *
00028  */
00029 
00030 //
00031 #include "chipstream/SummaryStats.h"
00032 //
00033 #include "util/Verbose.h"
00034 //
00035 #include <cassert>
00036 #include <cmath>
00037 #include <iostream>
00038 #include <vector>
00039 //
00040 //
00041 //
00042 
00043 void SummaryStats::addData(const std::vector<double> &dat)
00044 {
00045   assert(m_Counts.size() == m_Means.size());
00046   assert(m_Counts.size() == m_S.size());
00047   assert(m_Counts.size() == dat.size());
00048   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_Counts.size(); i++) {
00049     m_Counts[i]++;
00050     double delta = dat[i] - m_Means[i];
00051     m_Means[i] += delta / m_Counts[i];
00052     m_S[i] += delta * (dat[i] - m_Means[i]);
00053   }
00054 }
00055 
00056 void SummaryStats::resize(int size)
00057 {
00058   m_Counts.clear();
00059   m_Counts.resize(size);
00060   m_Means.clear();
00061   m_Means.resize(size);
00062   m_S.clear();
00063   m_S.resize(size);
00064 }
00065 
00066 double SummaryStats::getStdev(int index)
00067 {
00068   assert(index < m_Counts.size());
00069   if (m_Counts[index] <= 1) {
00070     Verbose::out(1, "Warning! SummaryStats::getStdev() - Must have counts > 1 for calculating stdev.");
00071     return 0;
00072   }
00073   return sqrt(m_S[index] / (m_Counts[index] - 1));
00074 }
00075 
00076 double SummaryStats::getMean(int index)
00077 {
00078   return m_Means[index];
00079 }
00080 
00081 void SummaryStats::reportIndex(std::ofstream &out, int index)
00082 {
00083   out << "\t" << m_Means[index];
00084   out << "\t" << getStdev(index);
00085 }
00086 
00087 void SummaryStats::report(std::ofstream &out, const std::string &name)
00088 {
00089   out << name << "_mean";
00090   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_Counts.size(); i++) {
00091     out << "\t" << m_Means[i];
00092   }
00093   out << std::endl;
00094   out << name << "_stdev";
00095   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_Counts.size(); i++) {
00096     out << "\t" << getStdev(i);
00097   }
00098   out << std::endl;
00099 }
